title: Sam Altman’s World Tour Hopes to Reassure AI Doomers
description: On a stop in London, the OpenAI CEO called for balanced regulation and warned of the risks of deepfake disinformation.

title: Why Fake Drake and AI-Generated Music Are Here to Stay
description: We talk to Puja Patel, editor in chief of Pitchfork and cohost of “The Pitchfork Review,” about how AI is taking over our feeds and where it goes from here.
